name: Fixing Life
description:
The theme is "All that glistens is not gold"

In this game you are member of a group of rebels who don't accept the fact that  technology is making people forget about the real life.

So your goal is to get inside the company who started this digital slavery and destroy all the energy generators, but this company is protected by robots.

What All that glistens has to do with this history?

- People looking at their shiny devices all the time

You can found the source available here: https://gitlab.com/alanduartes/fixinglife-ue4
